== Description ==
Loads default translated strings based on locale.

Loads the .mo file in <tt>WP_LANG_DIR</tt> constant path from WordPress root. The translated (.mo) file is named based off of the locale.

== Usage ==
%%%<?php load_default_textdomain() ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
None.

== Return Values ==
; (void) : This function does not return a value.
